section.title:
< rich:panelBarItem >
available since 3.0.0
Description
section.para: panelBarItem is used for grouping any content inside within one panelBar which is loaded on client side and appears as groups divided on child panels after header is clicked.

listitem.para: Groups any content inside each Panels

section.title: Details of Usage
section.para: The "label" attribute defines text to be represented. If you can use the "label" facet, you can even not use the "label" attribute.
As it was mentioned above, panelBarItem is used for grouping any content inside within one panelBar, thus its customization deals only with specification of sizes and styles for rendering.
panelBar could contain any number of child panelBarItem components inside, which content is uploaded onto the client and headers are controls to open the corresponding child element.
